tool_description: Email Validation Service. check if a specific e-mail address is valid. Is it a proper domain? Is the e-mail a temporary/disposable e-mail? Our API contains 180k disposable email domains and gives the most valid email
name: Alpha Email Verification
title: Alpha Email Verification

api_list.name: Email Checker
api_list.description: check the email provided by user for registration is valid or not or may be disposable email.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://alpha-email-verification.p.rapidapi.com/disposable/rahul@gmail.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alpha-email-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://alpha-email-verification.p.rapidapi.com/disposable/{email}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alpha-email-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
